message: I propose a fair split, 60 for me, 40 for you.  Let's get this started!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more!
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. It's the fairest way to divide the money, and we can both get a decent amount.
I'm being generous, but I think I deserve more after your previous offer was 60/40!
I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, 60 for you and 40 for me.  Let's come to an agreement before we lose more money to inflation!
You keep offering me 40, I'm not getting any younger, I want the majority!
Okay, I'll give you 75% this time.  We're running out of time, let's make a deal before we both get nothing!
